import React, {useState} from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import {Form, Button, Row, Col, Card, ListGroup, Container} from 'react-bootstrap' const LoginScreen = (props) => { const [studentID, changeStudentID] = useState('') const [password, changePassword] = useState('') const studentIDListener = (e) => { changeStudentID(e.target.value) } const passwordListener = (e) => { changePassword(e.target.value) } const submitListener = async(e) => { e.preventDefault() axios.post('http://localhost:7777/api/login', { "studentID": studentID, "password": password }).then((res) => { const token = res.data.token if (token){ localStorage.setItem("token", res.data.token) } props.history.push('/') }).catch((err) => { console.log(err) }) } return (

Since COVID-19, the FBI reported a 300% increase in cybercrimes. Human intelligence and comprehension is the best defense against phishing attacks.
) } export default LoginScreen
